text: hello and welcome to cupcake addictions

you can find so I think that our our

the first thing that we're going to do

ball there'll be a slightly flat bottom

we're going to have our two eyes and

because you only need a one-half to make

for the eyes we're going to complete

so you want to work quite quickly here
